briefdescription.para: Enum of the diffent types of icons.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculates height in px of a line of text of given size
textSize
Float, the text size multiplier used in M5GFX
Height in px of the line

briefdescription.para: Calculates length in px of a line of text of given size & character length.

parameterdescription.para: Float, the text size multiplier used in M5GFX
Length of the string in characters

simplesect.para: Length of the string in pixel

briefdescription.para: Calculates the maximum length of a String to be displayed in the given px w/ the given size.

parameterdescription.para: Int, width in px of the space were the string will be displayed
Float, the text size multiplier used in M5GFX

simplesect.para: Length of the maximum possible displayable stirng in characterts

briefdescription.para: Task handler function, isolated since it mustn't be a class function.

parameterdescription.para: Standar parameter for handler functions, a nullptr is passed if it is not needed

briefdescription.para: Task andler function for the update topBar task (must be executed async with the rest of the GUI)

parameterdescription.para: Standar parameter for handler functions, a nullptr is passed if it is not needed

briefdescription.para: ISR for the timer interrupt, one a second, wakes up the update topBar task & changes the timeFlag state to perform timed events.
